逢.definition: to meet by chance; to come across; (of a calendar event) to come along; (of an event) to fall on (a particular day); to fawn upon

逢人便講.definition: to tell anybody one happens to meet

逢俉.definition: to come across sth scary; to have a fright

逢凶化吉.definition: misfortune turns to blessing (idiom); to turn an inauspicious start to good account

逢場作戲.definition: lit. find a stage, put on a comedy (idiom); to join in the fun; to play along according to local conditions

逢年過節.definition: at the Chinese New Year or other festivities

逢迎.definition: to fawn on; to ingratiate oneself; (literary) to meet face to face
